title: EDA
objective: To perform exploratory data analysis by summarizing the main characteristics of datasets and visualizing patterns, often using statistical graphics and other data visualization methods.

title: Linear Regression
objective: To model and analyze the relationship between a scalar dependent variable and one or more independent variables, enabling prediction and inference on continuous outcomes.

title: Classification
objective: To build predictive models that assign new observations to discrete categories or class labels based on input features.

title: Clustering
objective: To discover inherent groupings or patterns within unlabeled data by grouping similar data points together based on their features.

title: NLP
objective: To enable machines to process, understand, and generate human language for tasks like translation, sentiment analysis, and text summarization.

title: Time Series Analysis
objective: To analyze time-based data to extract meaningful statistics, identify trends and seasonality, and forecast future values.

title: Dimensionality Reduction
objective: To reduce the number of random variables under consideration by obtaining a set of principal variables, simplifying models and aiding visualization.

title: Data Wrangling
objective: To clean, structure, and enrich raw data into a desired format for effective analysis and decision-making.

title: Neural Networks
objective: To design computing systems that learn to perform tasks by considering examples, typically without being programmed with task-specific rules, for recognizing complex patterns.

title: Model Deployment
objective: To integrate a trained machine learning model into an existing production environment to make practical, data-driven decisions automatically.
